DOC.brief_summary: Prospective multicenter sample collection test study .
DOC.brief_title: 99th Percentile Upper Reference Limit ( URL ) Meritas Troponin I Test
DOC.detailed_description: Prospective multicenter sample collection test study . Approximately 750 apparently healthy subject , include healthy subject stable co-morbidities , age , gender ethnicity disperse eligible enrollment
DOC.criteria: 1 . Male female least 21 year age time enrollment study . 2 . Subjects medication change medication last 3 month . 3 . Subjects without chronic stable morbidity ( i.e. , renal insufficiency , hypertension , diabetes , hypercholesterolemia , pulmonary disorder , coronary disease , musculoskeletal disorder , etc. ) . 4 . Subjects able understand sign inform consent patient questionnaire . 1 . Subjects history heart failure and/or , receive treatment heart failure . 2 . Subject renal failure . 3 . Subjects history unstable heart disease angina complaint . 4 . Subjects change medication last 3 month ( diabetic may small variation glucose medication may unstable disease , suffer diabetic crisis last 6 month ) . 5 . Any known acute infection last 30 day . 6 . Marathon runner extreme athlete . 7 . Pregnant ( selfreported ) .
